name: UsportsHub
overview:
Simplifying College Sports.

UsportsHub offers a new direction for online college sports media and how fans keep up with their favorite teams. The first step is UsportsHub beta, an online college basketball publication that provides news, rumors and expert analysis on all 346 teams in men’s NCAA Division 1 basketball. Our process involves review of 1000+ pieces of content a day including sports articles, videos and podcasts around the web. We then filter and categorize this content into article previews and deliver in a simple news feed.

You’ll also find original content from Hub Insiders, including former players, coaches and other seasoned experts co-written with our team of professional sports writers. Our experts provide in-depth analysis on both High School Basketball Recruiting and NBA Draft that you will not find anywhere else. UsportsHub simply makes it easier to be an informed college basketball fan.
